title: My google pixel 3a XL's screen goes fully black nothing display on screen
content:
Dear team 
I bought Google pixel 3a XL from Flipkart in December 2019 and delivered on 27th Dec 2019. I used on regular basis suddenly my screen gone fully black I thought that phone's battery was fully Darin but my phone is ringing or vibrating and now I am not able to operate without display. My phone is under warranty can you please help me out how to fix this issue and how to repair if there is no any physically store in India City - Chandigarh zip code -160022
